programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Cameras follow events that took place at a 1970s Pennsylvania research facility used to investigate the existence of supernatural powers. Found-footage horror, starring Rya Kihlstedt, William Mapother and Sharon Maughan

programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: Premiere. An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: Salt and Fire
programme.desc: Scientists investigating rare geological formations in Bolivia are abducted by a rogue businessman. Eco-thriller from director Werner Herzog, starring Michael Shannon, Veronica Ferres and Gael Garcia Bernal

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown

programme.title: Adult Beginners

programme.title: Racing Hearts
programme.desc: Premiere. A businessman travels to a small Belgian village on an unusual assignment. A wealthy Dubai sheikh he is trying to make a deal with has a passion for pigeon racing, and wants to own a famous champion bird. As the visitor tries to persuade the breeder to part with the creature, he falls for the man's granddaughter. Romantic drama, with Jamie Dornan, Charlotte De Bruyne and Anthony Head

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: Premiere. An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: Premiere. A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah

programme.title: Abattoir
programme.desc: Premiere. A reporter investigates the story of a man trying to build a haunted house out of rooms where terrible things have happened. Horror from Saw veteran Darren Lynn Bousman, starring Joe Anderson, Jessica Lowndes and Lin Shaye(n)

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: Premiere. A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah(n)

programme.title: Tiger Raid
programme.desc: While on a covert mission, two cold-blooded mercenaries form an unlikely bond as they race across the desert in the dead of night. Action thriller, starring Damien Molony and Sofia Boutella

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: A woman who has rarely been without a boyfriend moves to New York following a break-up with her boyfriend. She makes a fun-loving new friend, who introduces her to the city's nightlife and teaches her to enjoy the advantages of being single. Comedy, starring Dakota Johnson, Rebel Wilson, Alison Brie and Leslie Mann

programme.title: Tell Me How I Die
programme.desc: Premiere. After a group of college students take part in a clinical drug trial, they experience terrifying visions of their own deaths which start to come true. Thriller, starring Nathan Kress, Virginia Gardner and Kirby Bliss Blanton

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: An oil tanker suffers devastating damage while caught in a fierce Atlantic storm, which breaks the vessel in two. While an engineer tries to keep the crew members trapped in the sinking wreckage alive, members of the Coast Guard brave the deadly conditions to come to their rescue. Fact-based disaster movie, starring Chris Pine, Casey Affleck and Eric Bana

programme.title: Reckless
programme.desc: A married federal prosecutor stands poised on the brink of a bright future in politics. Everything starts to unravel when he hires an escort for the night. The experience ignites an uncontrollable sex addiction, and as his career blossoms, he faces a constant challenge hiding his actions from the media and his ambitious wife. Drama, starring Patrick Wilson, Lena Headey, Ray Winstone and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager discovers his new neighbour is the writer of a popular series of books, who harbours a terrifying secret. The ghosts and monsters the author writes about are real, and his stories keep them contained. The youngster accidentally releases them into the real world, and has to find a way to get them back in the books before they can cause chaos. Fantasy adventure, starring Jack Black and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Premiere. Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: A highly trained military dog is left traumatised when his handler is killed under suspicious circumstances, and is placed in the care of the dead man's troubled teenage brother. The begrudging owner gradually bonds with the animal, and together they try to solve the mystery of the soldier's death. Drama, starring Thomas Haden Church and Josh Wiggins

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: A CIA agent is forced into an uneasy alliance with his arch-rival in the KGB at the height of the Cold War. A criminal organisation is planning to alter the balance of power by making nuclear weapons widely available, and the two spies must work together to foil the plan. Action adventure based on the 1960s TV series, starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager discovers his new neighbour is the writer of a popular series of books, who harbours a terrifying secret. The ghosts and monsters the author writes about are real, and his stories keep them contained. The youngster accidentally releases them into the real world, and has to find a way to get them back in the books before they can cause chaos. Fantasy adventure, starring Jack Black and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Premiere. Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious TV weatherman reporting on a small town's annual festival finds himself caught in a bizarre time loop, and is forced to relive the same day over and over again. While at first he tries to exploit his predicament, he is ultimately driven to mend his ways and adopt a less cynical attitude. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A ruthless millionaire hires a prostitute while on a business trip. Realising she may be useful in helping him keep up a successful appearance, he pays her to accompany him for a week as he associates with the rich and powerful - but falls in love despite their many differences. Romantic comedy, starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, with Ralph Bellamy and Laura San Giacomo(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: A boy brings five mysterious stones back from a holiday, which attract supernatural forces that terrorise his family. Horror, starring Kevin Bacon and Radha Mitchell(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man(n)

programme.title: Pay the Ghost
programme.desc: A professor's son vanishes without trace during a Halloween carnival. One year later, the academic becomes determined to solve the mystery of the boy's disappearance, but his search for answers leads him to encounter dangerous paranormal forces. Supernatural thriller based on a short story by Tim Lebbon, starring Nicolas Cage and Sarah Wayne Callies(n)

programme.title: Rupture
programme.desc: A divorced single mother is kidnapped and kept for experimentation by a group of sinister scientists. Sci-fi horror-thriller, starring Noomi Rapace, Peter Stormare and Kerry Bishe(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth(n)

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enters a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmother's house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: A tone deaf socialite has dreams of becoming a singer, but problems arise when she decides to perform at Carnegie Hall. Fact-based comedy, starring Meryl Streep(n)

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters are reunited when their parents decide to sell the house they grew up in. They return to the family home to clear out their childhood bedrooms, but with their parents away, seize the chance to relive their teenage years and throw one last wild house party. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler, Tina Fey and Dianne Wiest(n)

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Scheming politicians try to manipulate the unwitting Ali G into bringing about the downfall of the prime minister - but fail to appreciate that his streetwise attitude could give the government much-needed street cred. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Michael Gambon, Charles Dance, Kellie Bright, Martin Freeman and Rhona Mitra

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his gang of daredevil friends bring the MTV series to the big screen. As usual, they perform a variety of weird and wonderful stunts, including crawling across dozens of mousetraps while wearing rodent make-up, and being rolled down bowling lanes on skateboards. Comedy, with Bam Margera, Henry Rollins, Spike Jonze and Tony Hawk

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Three bungling brothers manage to pull off a major robbery in a backwoods community on Christmas Eve, but the unwitting locals make them feel so welcome they find it impossible to leave town, leaving the crooks facing a crisis of conscience. Offbeat comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Dana Carvey, Jon Lovitz and Madchen Amick

programme.title: Rock the Kasbah
programme.desc: A has-been rock manager is left stranded in war-torn Kabul after his last remaining client abandons him. He meets a local teenager who has dreams of becoming a pop star, and tries to make her the first female contestant on a TV talent show, assisted by a prostitute, a mercenary and a couple of war profiteers. Comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Leem Lubany, Bruce Willis, Kate Hudson and Zooey Deschanel

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A dim-witted supermodel must step back into the spotlight and save the day when someone starts murdering pop stars. Comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Grimsby
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated at birth, the younger growing up to be MI6's top agent while the older becomes a layabout football hooligan. When they are finally reunited, the dim-witted elder sibling ends up helping his brother foil an evil plan that threatens the entire world. Action comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong and Rebel Wilson

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: A Kazakhstani journalist is sent to the United States to learn about the country and its customs. However, when the inquisitive reporter stumbles across an episode of Baywatch featuring Pamela Anderson, he becomes convinced she is his future bride and embarks on a reckless mission to track her down. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Ken Davitian and Pamela Anderson

programme.title: Airheads
programme.desc: Frustrated heavy metal band the Lone Rangers are determined to get air time for their new record and take a radio station hostage to ensure it happens. Comedy, starring Steve Buscemi, Brendan Fraser, Adam Sandler and Michael McKean

programme.title: What About Bob
programme.desc: A psychiatrist takes on a friend's client, who turns out to be a well-meaning but annoying neurotic barely able to leave his home. The patient is hugely impressed by the consultant's methods, leading him to follow the therapist on holiday, where he unwittingly proceeds to make his life hell while winning over his family. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty and Charlie Korsmo

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A teenager is given a strange, cute creature as a Christmas present by his eccentric father and warned to keep it away from water, not to feed it after midnight, or expose it to direct light. However, a chance dousing causes the furball to spawn a horde of murderous little monsters, and their devilish antics bring mayhem to a small town. Comedy horror, with Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton and Polly Holliday

programme.title: Breaking the Bank
programme.desc: A family-run British bank attracts the attention of ruthless Japanese and American corporations determined to buy them out. The incompetent chairman faces a struggle to save the business as well as his own marriage. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Tamsin Greig, John Michael Higgins and Andrew Sachs

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: A washed-up and embittered baseball player struggles with bad memories of a failed sports career. When his exasperated lawyer suggests he coach a losing Little-League team, he begins to turn himself and the youngsters into a force to be reckoned with. Richard Linklater's remake of the 1970s comedy, starring Billy Bob Thornton, Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden and Emmanuel Estrada

programme.title: Mr Right
programme.desc: A woman falls for what she thinks is an ideal guy, but he turns out to be a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him. Action comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Sam Rockwell and Tim Roth

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two college graduates faced with the prospect of deciding what to do with their lives find themselves faced with a more immediate crisis - getting and keeping a job. Their search for employment takes them through a succession of strange experiences and even stranger workplaces. Comedy, starring Miles Teller, Anna Kendrick, Bryan Cranston and Alison Brie

programme.title: The Bad Education Movie
programme.desc: Incompetent teacher Alfie Wickers decides his students deserve a treat for somehow passing their GCSEs, so decides to take them on the greatest school trip of their lives - to Cornwall. However, a series of disasters leaves the class into trouble with suspicious locals. Comedy, starring Jack Whitehall, Harry Enfield and Iain Glen

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Excitable beat cop Ben longs to work alongside his fiancee's brother, hard-boiled detective James, who does not think he has what it takes. James decides to show Ben that he is not cut out for the job by recruiting him to help bring a drug dealer to justice. Comedy sequel, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Olivia Munn(n)

programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: A gay Austrian fashion journalist becomes a figure of hate in his own country, and heads to America in search of celebrity with his adoring assistant in tow. He embarks on a campaign of publicity stunts to make himself famous, encountering prejudice and meeting people similarly desperate for stardom. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen and Gustaf Hammarsten(n)

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detective's well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
programme.desc: Cute furball Gizmo is reunited with his human friends Billy and Kate, who now work in the New York offices of an eccentric tycoon. However, it is not long before Gizmo has spawned a new generation of murderous carnivores, who quickly overrun the building - and a genetics lab where they produce even more startling mutations. Joe Dante's comedy sequel, starring Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, John Glover and Christopher Lee(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn(n)

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns(n)

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb
programme.desc: A bungling private eye sets out to rescue the abducted daughter of a millionaire. Unfortunately, the hapless sleuth is unaware his oily boss is behind the kidnapping and has only given him the task because he is sure to fail - while leaving himself free to make a move on the millionaire's wife. Comedy, starring John Candy, Jeffrey Jones, Annie Potts and Tim Thomerson(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A recently divorced bookshop owner finds love with a glamorous Hollywood film star, but ends up the focus of unwanted media interest - which makes maintaining a relationship a tricky proposition. Romantic comedy written by Richard Curtis, starring Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Rhys Ifans, Emma Chambers, James Dreyfus and Gina McKee(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns(n)

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: A couple on the brink of divorce sign up for relationship therapy on a tropical island, but find they can save money if they persuade their friends to join them. Three more couples go along for the holiday, thinking they do not need any help - but the unconventional treatment soon exposes cracks in their relationships. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Malin Akerman, Jon Favreau and Jason Bateman(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Vampire warrior Selene and her lover, a hybrid creature, must flee for their lives from the eldest of her kind. The ancient bloodsucker plans to find and release his imprisoned brother, the first ever werewolf, but Selene knows the creature will simply destroy everything in its path and must fight to destroy both of them. Action fantasy sequel, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman and Derek Jacobi

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Secret agents suspect there is a traitor in their organisation when their latest assignment ends in disaster. The sole survivor is accused of being the mole, forcing him to go on the run to clear his name. However, in the process, he discovers a former Russian spy is selling information about the world's leading undercover operatives. Action thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Ving Rhames

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Secret agents suspect there is a traitor in their organisation when their latest assignment ends in disaster. The sole survivor is accused of being the mole, forcing him to go on the run to clear his name. However, in the process, he discovers a former Russian spy is selling information about the world's leading undercover operatives. Action thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Ving Rhames

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman

programme.title: Camino
programme.desc: A photographer ventures deep into the jungles of Colombia to document a group of missionaries. However, when she witnesses the leader of the group committing a horrific crime, she faces a battle for survival to make it back to civilisation with the evidence before his followers have her killed. Action thriller, starring Zoe Bell and Nacho Vigalondo

programme.title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Surviving gunslinger Chris is hired by Mexican revolutionaries to rescue their leader from a military prison. After assembling a crack team including a knife-fighting expert and a firearms aficionado, the group embarks on its mission - but underestimates the depths to which its enemies will sink. Second sequel to the Western, starring George Kennedy, James Whitmore, Monte Markham, Joe Don Baker and Reni Santoni

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngster's assailants using his martial art skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: An enigmatic British Army officer tries to unite the Arab nations against the Turks during the First World War, but comes into conflict with the military authorities when he engages the enemy with guerrilla tactics instead of more conventional methods. However, his increasingly torn loyalties leave him close to madness. Oscar-winning epic drama directed by David Lean, starring Peter O'Toole, Omar Sharif, Anthony Quinn, Alec Guinness and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: The heavyweight champion is forced into retirement due to brain damage inflicted in the ring, and finds his fortune has been lost on the stock market by his accountant. Returning to his working-class roots, he trains an up-and-coming fighter, only to see his protege turn against him. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire and real-life boxer Tommy Morrison

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: A whaling ship sets sail from New England in 1820, only to come under attack from a gigantic whale that seems to want revenge on them. In the aftermath of the attack, the surviving members of the crew face further physical and moral challenges as they try to stay alive on the open sea. Fact-based historical adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy and Ben Whishaw

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Despite working together for nine years, police partners Jimmy and Paul frequently struggle to get along. When Paul's erratic behaviour leads to the pair being suspended without pay, Jimmy is forced to sell a rare baseball card to raise funds for his daughter's wedding. However, when the collector selling the item is robbed, the duo team up to recover the memorabilia. Action comedy, starring Bruce Willis, Tracy Morgan, Juan Carlos Hernandez, Cory Fernandez and Ana de la Reguera(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: The teenage martial arts expert becomes obsessed with defending his championship title, but wise mentor Mr Miyagi is not prepared to help him fight for such a shallow goal. Seeking someone else to help guide his career, he falls under the influence of a crooked trainer - who is secretly plotting his downfall with the help of an old adversary. Adventure sequel, starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita(n)

programme.title: Precious Cargo
programme.desc: A thief is marked for death by a crime boss after a heist goes badly wrong. To win back his trust, she plans to steal a cargo of rare precious gems and recruits a former lover to carry out the job. However, as the robbery is put into action, nobody is sure who to trust. Crime thriller, starring Claire Forlani and Bruce Willis(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A crazed CIA agent based in Mexico learns of a conspiracy involving a drug baron and a military general to assassinate the president. He finds the perfect man to prevent the coup in the shape of a legendary gunslinger, who is seeking revenge on the general for murdering his wife. Action thriller, concluding Robert Rodriguez's El Mariachi trilogy, starring Antonio Banderas, Johnny Depp, Willem Dafoe, Mickey Rourke and Salma Hayek(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The ageing fighter contemplates a return to the ring when a computer simulation reveals he would have defeated the current world heavyweight champion Mason `The Line' Dixon, who responds by challenging Rocky to face him for real. Boxing drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Antonio Tarver, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young, Milo Ventimiglia and Tony Burton(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: As the machines threaten the last refuge of humanity, a party of freedom fighters journeys into the virtual world of the Matrix to find a means to end the war once and for all. However, the computer programme Agent Smith, once a tool of the machines, has returned from the dead with his own plans for the world. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: As the machines threaten the last refuge of humanity, a party of freedom fighters journeys into the virtual world of the Matrix to find a means to end the war once and for all. However, the computer programme Agent Smith, once a tool of the machines, has returned from the dead with his own plans for the world. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: At the height of the Cold War, former superheroes driven into retirement by public outcry are confronted with the murder of one of their number. As they face the possibility of a conspiracy to eliminate them, they must contend with a world edging closer to the brink of nuclear war. Sci-fi drama, based on Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons' graphic novel, starring Patrick Wilson, Jackie Earle Haley, Malin Akerman and Billy Crudup

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Special
programme.desc: The making of the new Marvel superhero movie, which sees Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, taking on Michael Keaton's Vulture with the help of Iron Man

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: As the survivors of the human race make their last stand against the machines, freedom fighters Neo and Trinity undertake a desperate journey into the heart of the enemy stronghold seeking a way to end the war, while the rogue computer programme Smith sets about remaking the virtual world of the Matrix in his own image. Conclusion of the sci-fi trilogy, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: As the survivors of the human race make their last stand against the machines, freedom fighters Neo and Trinity undertake a desperate journey into the heart of the enemy stronghold seeking a way to end the war, while the rogue computer programme Smith sets about remaking the virtual world of the Matrix in his own image. Conclusion of the sci-fi trilogy, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A vampire fights a war against werewolves that has raged for centuries, with the human race oblivious to the conflict. She falls in love with a mortal man who has wandered unwittingly into the midst of a conflict, and must protect him from both the enemy, who have plans for him, and her own side. Supernatural action thriller, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen and Bill Nighy(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: Arch-villainess Divatox plots to take over the Earth by corrupting the powers of a kindly old wizard, and only the colour-coded crusaders, joined by old team-mates Jason and Kimberley, stand in her way. Sci-fi adventure, with Jason David Frank and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: The Strongest Man in the World
programme.desc: A student and his friends discover a formula that, when mixed with breakfast cereal, gives them superhuman strength. However, it is not long before their breakthrough is noticed by the criminal fraternity and a motley assortment of crooks are after the secret. Disney comedy, starring Kurt Russell, Eve Arden, Joe Flynn, Cesar Romero and Phil Silvers

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: An oil tanker suffers devastating damage while caught in a fierce Atlantic storm, which breaks the vessel in two. While an engineer tries to keep the crew members trapped in the sinking wreckage alive, members of the Coast Guard brave the deadly conditions to come to their rescue. Fact-based disaster movie, starring Chris Pine, Casey Affleck and Eric Bana

programme.title: Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search for Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Christopher Robin starts school and leaves a note for Winnie the Pooh explaining why he will not be around any more. However, the bear misunderstands the message and becomes convinced his friend is in grave danger, organising the other animals into a rescue attempt. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and John Fiedler

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat finds his love of fine food has made him an outcast to his less discerning family. Separated from his fellow rodents by a storm, he winds up in a famous French restaurant, where he helps an incompetent kitchen assistant become the greatest chef in Paris. Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs

programme.title: Summer Magic
programme.desc: A hard-up widow moves into a rambling old house in Maine, where she struggles to control her three quarrelsome children. She also has to deal with the visit of her snobbish cousin, who falls for a schoolteacher her teenage daughter has her heart set on. Disney musical comedy, starring Hayley Mills, Burl Ives, Dorothy McGuire, Una Merkel and Michael J Pollard

programme.title: Shipwrecked
programme.desc: A youngster joins a sailing ship to raise money to save his parents' farm, but soon finds himself mixed up in adventure after being thrown overboard and washed up on an island inhabited by a gang of pirates. Disney adventure, starring Gabriel Byrne, Stian Smestad and Louisa Haigh

programme.title: Mickey's Once Upon a Christmas
programme.desc: Anthology of three animated festive tales featuring the Disney characters. Donald Duck finds himself reliving Christmas day with his nephews over and over again, Goofy tries to convince his son that there really is a Santa Claus, and Mickey and Minnie Mouse both give up something special to get each other a present. Introduced by Kelsey Grammer, and with the voices of Wayne Allwine and Shaun Flemming

Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: A Native American princess falls in love with an English settler, but her father is distrustful of the Europeans - not without just cause, as a cruel governor is prepared to wage war to get his hands on the gold he believes they are hiding. Disney animated drama, with the voices of Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson and Christian Bale

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn

programme.title: Moana

programme.title: Jungle 2 Jungle
programme.desc: A businessman ventures deep into the Amazon to look for his estranged doctor wife seeking a divorce, only to discover he has a 13-year-old son who has been raised as part of a jungle tribe. The boy is sent back to New York with his father, but has a lot to learn about the modern world. Comedy, starring Tim Allen, Lolita Davidovich, Martin Short, JoBeth Williams and Sam Huntington

programme.title: Benji the Hunted
programme.desc: Talented mongrel Benji is separated from his trainer in a shipwreck and ends up stranded in the Canadian wilderness - where he becomes foster father to a litter of orphaned cougar cubs. However, a hungry timber wolf is also prowling in the area, and looks set to clash with the courageous dog. Disney adventure, starring Red Steagall, Frank Inn and Nancy Francis

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: The owners of a cat and two dogs leave their pets with a friend in a remote area of Canada while they take a holiday abroad. When the minder embarks on a hunting trip, the three animals find themselves unattended and set out on a hazardous journey through the wilderness to get back home. Disney adventure, starring Emile Genest and John Drainie(n)

programme.title: In Search of the Castaways
programme.desc: The two children of a missing sea captain receive a message in a bottle that convinces them their father is still alive. Enlisting an eccentric French professor to help them find him, they embark on round-the-world journey and face natural disasters and mutineers during the voyage. Children's adventure based on a novel by Jules Verne, starring Maurice Chevalier, Hayley Mills and George Sanders(n)

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: A Native American princess falls in love with an English settler, but her father is distrustful of the Europeans - not without just cause, as a cruel governor is prepared to wage war to get his hands on the gold he believes they are hiding. Disney animated drama, with the voices of Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson and Christian Bale(n)

programme.title: The Great Mouse Detective
programme.desc: The evil Professor Ratigan masterminds a cunning plan to become supreme ruler of all mousedom by kidnapping a clever toy-maker and forcing him to participate in his evil schemes - but super-sleuth Basil of Baker Street is soon on the case. Animated adventure, with the voices of Vincent Price, Barrie Ingham, Val Bettin and Alan Young(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan(n)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast

programme.title: Zootropolis

When the disappearance of an otter hints at a terrible conspiracy in the city, she enlists the aid of a con-artist fox in solving the mystery. Disney animated comedy, with the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba(n)

Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: Frankenweenie
programme.desc: A lonely boy uses electricity to bring his dead dog back to life. However, the presence of the animal in the neighbourhood leads to panic over a monster, while the young scientist's classmates are soon also meddling with life and death to revive their own pets. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Charlie Tahan and Winona Ryder(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book

programme.title: Operation Dumbo Drop
programme.desc: Five Green Berets stationed in Vietnam grudgingly undertake a bizarre mission - to help their native hosts by transporting a fully-grown elephant through 200 miles of rough jungle terrain. They soon hit upon a novel way of delivering the beast, deciding to load it into a plane, and then parachute it to its destination. Comedy, starring Danny Glover, Ray Liotta, Denis Leary and Doug E Doug(n)

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Musical remake, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid

programme.title: Inside Out: Special
programme.desc: The making of the Pixar animation, taking viewers inside the mind of a youngster as she copes with the emotional upheaval of moving to a new town and new school

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed

programme.title: An Eskimo Tale
programme.desc: When animals start mysteriously disappearing, three young Inuits embark on a perilous journey to save their tribe from ruin. Animated adventure, with the voice of Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan

Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack and Donald O'Connor(n)

programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement(n)

programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure(n)

programme.desc: A primate king's outcast son eventually comes into his own, learning how to run on two legs and the secrets of fire. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ben Bishop, Anjella Mackintosh and Geoff Searle(n)

Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara(n)

Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald(n)
