programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Sam (Chris Pine) is a twenty-something, fast-talking salesman whose latest deal collapses the day he learns his father has suddenly died. Against his wishes, Sam is called home to put his father's estate in order and reconnect with his estranged family. While there, he uncovers a startling secret that turns his entire world upside down - he has a 30-year-old sister (Elizabeth Banks) he never knew existed. Michelle Pfeiffer and Oliva Wilde co-star in this smart and witty drama

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.desc: Tara and Kate take a trip together, but end up in a fight that causes Tara to become "T" and head straight for the nearest tattoo parlor; Max uses his wife's time away to search for answers about her past(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Betrayal
programme.desc: Tara is shocked when her therapist terminates treatment, sending her into a meltdown with Charmaine and leading her to betray Marshall in a way that could destroy her family's trust forever(n)

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: Tara checks into a facility that specializes in dissociation, where she is urged to delve more deeply into her suppressed memories of the past(n)

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: In Season 1 finale, Tara comes face to face with an important person from her past, and begins to heal some of her pain by reconciling with Marshall(n)

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall(n)

programme.title: Good Advice
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as a successful stockbroker who, after losing his fortune on a bad stock tip, decides to secretly write into his ex-girlfriend's less-than-successful advice column, setting of a romantic chain of events. Also stars Denise Richards and Rosanna Arquette(n)

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart is a teenager traumatized into silence after a summer party ends in a police raid that leaves her ostracized by her friends but unable to explain her actions. Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson(n)

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs(n)

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: Popular high school teacher Jim McAllister (Matthew Broderick) is secretly annoyed with perky overachieving student Tracy Flick (Reese Witherspoon), so he goes to extreme lengths to make sure Tracy loses an upcoming class election. This award-winning dark comedy from writer and director Alexander Payne (Citizen Ruth) costars Chris Klein, Jessica Campbell and Mark Harelik(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A couple meet on a Long Island commuter train, are drawn to each other's opposing personalities, and begin a tenuous relationship. Then they discover that they were already lovers for two years in the past, and chose to have their painful relationship erased from their minds by the cutting-edge technology of a company called Lacuna Inc., where the employees are hiding their own secrets from each other and themselves. Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet and Kirsten Dunst star in this acclaimed comedy drama that won an Oscar(R) for Best Original Screenplay(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places(n)

programme.title: Adult World
programme.desc: Satirical comedy about a naive college graduate who believes she's destined to be a great poet, but in the meantime must move back in with her parents and take a job at a sex shop, while she pursues a mentorship with a reclusive writer. Stars John Cusack(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: The Naked Jungle
programme.desc: Charlton Heston plays a plantation owner threatened by soldier ants. Joanne: Eleanor Parker. Commissioner: William Conrad. Incacha: Abraham Sofaer. Boat Captain: Romo Vincent. Medicine Man: Douglas Fowley. Gruber: John Dierkes. Based on the story "Leiningen vs. the Ants" by Carl Stephenson. Byron Haskin directed. (cc)

programme.title: Scaramouche
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, a roguish ne'er-do-well masquerades as an actor in a plot to avenge the death of his friend who was killed during a duel with a master swordsman. The film is famous for one of the longest sword fights in cinema history. Lewis Stone costars as Georges de Valmorin and played villainous Marquis de la Tour d'Azyr in the 1923 silent version

programme.title: Valley of the Kings
programme.desc: An adventurous archaeologist battles tomb hunters and grave robbers on an expedition in turn-of-the-century Egypt, where he's searching for the burial site of an ancient pharaoh

programme.title: The Woman in White
programme.desc: In 1851 England, a young artist goes to a grand estate to give painting lessons to a beautiful young woman, only to discover an eccentric cast of characters filling out the house

programme.title: Of Human Bondage
programme.desc: Story of a disabled and introverted medical student's relationship with a crass waitress. Based on the novel of W. Somerset Maugham

programme.title: Today We Live
programme.desc: A love triangle set during World War I centers on a pleasure-seeking British woman who is romantically involved with her brother's naval buddy. She then falls for an American pilot who is thought to have later died during a combat mission

programme.title: Dangerous
programme.desc: A fading alcoholic actress gets a comeback shot thanks to a wealthy architect who backs a project for her. She is a success again, and falls in love with her benefactor, but grows to believe she is bad luck to the men in her life and proceeds to break up with him

programme.title: Exclusive Story
programme.desc: A newspaper battles racketeers

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: A husband and wife detective team get wrapped up in a racketeering and murder plot revolving around a beauty pageant while on vacation at the beach

programme.title: The Wife Takes a Flyer
programme.desc: Satire about occupied Holland. A Dutch family pass off a sheltered British pilot (Franchot Tone) as their son. Joan Bennett, Allyn Joslyn, Roger Clark. Richard Wallace directed

programme.title: Uncle Vanya

programme.desc: With Jr. in danger of failing algebra, Michael comes up with a unique plan to help him pass; and Jay has mother-daughter relationship problems with Claire, who is turning into “little Miss Attitude.” Janine: Dawn Stern. Mr. Griggler: David Lewison. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. (George O. Gore II) is being teased by a new neighbor (Preston Wamsley), a boy who is much bigger than he is. But the bully is no match for Claire (Jazz Raycole). Meanwhile, Michael and Jay are once again sparring over Jay's working. “You're Wonder Woman,” he tells her, “because every time I come home I'm wondering, 'where's my woman?'.” Joseph: Stephen Lee. Maddy: Jacqueline Schultz. Jay: Tisha Campbell Martin. Michael: Damon Wayans. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: It seems as though Michael and Jay are speaking Chinese---they simply aren't paying attention to each other one Saturday. It all begins because she wants him to take part in family activities and he wants to watch basketball. So he tunes her out when she asks him to do something. Of course he doesn't know what it is. Michael: Damon Wayans. Jay: Tisha Campbell-Martin. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: While clothes shopping with Fancy and her parents (Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis Jr.), Jamie's credit card is denied, leading Fancy's father to question whether Jamie has the means to care for his daughter properly. Meanwhile, Braxton makes cuts in the hotel's budget. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Junior: Garrett Morris. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Fancy spies Jamie leaving a nightclub with an attractive, young female client whom he was ordered to take out on the town. When Fancy asks about the outing, Jamie describes the client as an old woman. Meanwhile, Braxton steals Fancy's idea for sprucing up the rooms at the hotel. Camille: Salli Richardson. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Bob: Blake Clark. Sheila: Sherri Shepherd. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie takes the guys to the beach in Fancy's new BMW, which gets towed while they're playing volleyball with some bikini-clad beauties. Meanwhile, Braxton faces a potential strike by the hotel's employees. Donyel: Traci Bingham. Larry: Perry Anzilotti. Gloria: Karen Maruyama. Sheila: Sherrie Shepherd. Phil: Alex Thomas. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Fancy needs a new kitchen countertop installed in time for Nikki's bridal shower, which Fancy reluctantly agrees to host. Meanwhile, Braxton dreads attending an awards banquet in his honor because he can't find a date. Albert: Paul Wilson. Jimmy: James A. Watson Jr. Gloria: Karen Maruyama. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: William Shatner stars as Hilary's talk-show guest---but Will must find a way to beam him from the dentist to the set. Meanwhile, Hilary's show is trekking to New York. West: Steve Ireland. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Family members are on the go, and everyone's "in the fast lane." Except for Will, who's stuck on life's "soft shoulder." Part 1 of two. Lady: Pat Crawford Brown. Mr. Clark: Christopher Kirby. Jazz: Jeffrey A. Townes. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Conclusion. A for-sale sign goes up at the Banks' mansion. Cameos by Sherman Hemsley, Isabel Sanford, Marla Gibbs, Gary Coleman and Conrad Bain. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will (Will Smith) becomes instrumental in convincing fledgling violinist Ashley to march to the beat of a different drummer. Madame Chatchka: Bette Ford. Ashley: Tatyana M. Ali. Philip: James Avery. Jazz: Jeff Townes. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Kat invites the crew to a lake house. Charmaine's job is in jeopardy after a night of hard partying. Nikki learns that Phor sent Kat roses. Ryan and Van come to blows. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Signed
programme.desc: Anxiety is high when the final round of auditions guarantees to send some artists home. With everyone coming at her, Brittany finds support in King Dillon; and JVOTI must make a life-changing decision. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: In the Season 4 premiere, Keyshia Cole confronts unresolved issues with her estranged husband, Booby; chaos erupts when Hazel-E squares off against her haters; a sexy new arrival threatens to turn Masika's world upside-down; and Teairra has a lunch date. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Ray J's struggle to start a family leads to an outrageous bet with A1 and Safaree; Keyshia gets advice from Too Short; Nikki Baby connects Chanel West Coast with a producer; and Brooke goes on a mission to uncover the truth about Ma. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Teairra's new man clashes with her social circle; Chanel leaps to her friend's defense at Safaree's party; Ray J's secret weighs on his conscience; Lyrica issues a startling demand to A1; and Alexis and Solo's relationship hits a snag. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Martha & Snoop's Potluck Dinner Party
programme.desc: Ashley Graham and Rick Ross join Martha and Snoop, as they cook lobster two ways. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Martha & Snoop's Potluck Dinner Party
programme.desc: Fat Joe and Kelis join the hosts for a hog roast. Also: Fat Joe and Remy Ma perform. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Martha & Snoop's Potluck Dinner Party
programme.desc: In the Season 1 finale, 50 Cent and Bella Thorne take a trip with Martha and Snoop to Old Italy, as they cook up pizzas. Later, October London performs his single "Shoulder to Lean On." (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 14)
programme.desc: "Z pamiętnika lekarki" powraca! To kolejna odsłona przygód doktor Gretchen Haase, uwikłanej w miłosną relację z dwoma kolegami po fachu. W ośmiu nowych odcinkach lekarka znów będzie starała się trzymać emocje na wodzy oraz walczyć z pokusami ciała i ducha. Czas pokaże, czy spragniona uczuć kobieta znajdzie swoją bratnią duszę, a przy okazji zgubi kilka zbędnych kilogramów. Do szpitala trafia matka Meiera. Cierpi na wrzody żołądka. Gretchen przenosi się w świat fantazji. Snuje rozważania na temat powieści 'Dr. Rogelt' i swojej roli w przedstawionej tam historii miłosnej

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 15)
programme.desc: Gretchen jest zakochana. Oczywiście w jej wypadku to nic nowego. Nadal w grze są trzej panowie, a może nawet na horyzoncie pojawi się czwarty. W towarzystwie jednego z nich Haase wybierze się do Las Vegas, nie wiadomo jednak, czy zamierza tam spróbować szczęścia w kasynie czy wziąć szybki ślub. Gabi dokona przerażającego odkrycia, które jest związane z mężczyzną o imieniu Kalle. Nie zabraknie seksu, trzech propozycji małżeństwa, tajemniczej plantacji marihuany - ale niestety nie oznacza to szczęśliwego zakończenia

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 17)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele trafiają na kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan ma sprawować nadzór, lecz zadanie go przerasta(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 14)
programme.desc: "Z pamiętnika lekarki" powraca! To kolejna odsłona przygód doktor Gretchen Haase, uwikłanej w miłosną relację z dwoma kolegami po fachu. W ośmiu nowych odcinkach lekarka znów będzie starała się trzymać emocje na wodzy oraz walczyć z pokusami ciała i ducha. Czas pokaże, czy spragniona uczuć kobieta znajdzie swoją bratnią duszę, a przy okazji zgubi kilka zbędnych kilogramów. Do szpitala trafia matka Meiera. Cierpi na wrzody żołądka. Gretchen przenosi się w świat fantazji. Snuje rozważania na temat powieści 'Dr. Rogelt' i swojej roli w przedstawionej tam historii miłosnej

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 15)
programme.desc: Gretchen jest zakochana. Oczywiście w jej wypadku to nic nowego. Nadal w grze są trzej panowie, a może nawet na horyzoncie pojawi się czwarty. W towarzystwie jednego z nich Haase wybierze się do Las Vegas, nie wiadomo jednak, czy zamierza tam spróbować szczęścia w kasynie czy wziąć szybki ślub. Gabi dokona przerażającego odkrycia, które jest związane z mężczyzną o imieniu Kalle. Nie zabraknie seksu, trzech propozycji małżeństwa, tajemniczej plantacji marihuany - ale niestety nie oznacza to szczęśliwego zakończenia

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 17)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele trafiają na kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan ma sprawować nadzór, lecz zadanie go przerasta(n)

programme.title: Show Me What You're Made Of
programme.desc: Our five spoilt kids head next to a thriving British textiles factory in the heart of the midlands, Leicester. The busy factory the kids set to work in makes fashion clothes for British high street names and UK supermarkets and so the work has to be done to a very high standard. Plus, as the factory is competing against cheap imports from China the targets here are very strict - everything has to be done in silence, at speed and with no compromise on quality. How will our kids cope when they are put to work on a real stitching line reporting to the strict factory boss Mick who makes sure his workers deliver quality work at all times? And when one of the team shows real promise, how do those who are lagging behind react? Presented by Stacey Dooley

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Jas decides to follow in her dad's footsteps and try out for the junior hockey team. Mr Salford was a legendary hockey goalie in his time at the school. When the try-outs are cancelled due to the coach not being available, Mr Salford steps in and offers his services as coach. Mrs Griggs is horrified - she could do without the chaos he inevitably brings with him - but he won't take no for an answer. Jas and her father are really superstitious and when things start going wrong Jas thinks she's jinxed, and then that she's passed on the jinx to her dad. When she's not picked as goalie for the team Jas is actually relieved - it must mean she's still jinxed and hasn't passed on the jinx to her dad. Eventually Jas does need to play in goal, but when she saves a crucial penalty she and her dad are delighted to realise they are not jinxed after all, just accident-prone! Meanwhile, Martha & Ollie get paranoid that Cassie & Maxwell are usurping them. They've taken over their favourite nook in the library and when they turn up to do their regular security check on Mrs Rennison's computer Cassie and Maxwell have already been there and done it. They decide they've got to get their own back and they sabotage a fizzy drinks maker Cassie and Maxwell have created to provide refreshments at the hockey match. They turn up the CO2 dial and everyone gets very burpy! Lily is feeling abandoned by her friends - they all seem too busy to hang out with her. Matt advises her that a big gesture could do the trick. When she unfurls a giant banner during the hockey match declaring her admiration for her friends it's really embarrassing. It does prompt Martha and Ollie to do the right thing, though, and confess to Cassie and Maxwell that they sabotaged their fizzy drinks machine and does inspire Jas to save that crucial penalty(n)

programme.title: Get Well Soon
programme.sub-title: Get Well Soon Hospital: Plaster Cast.
programme.desc: Visiting Dr Ranj at the Children's hospital today is Petal. Petal needs the cast on her arm changing because it has got dirty and is crumbling. Petal has a fractured arm. Dr Ranj shows her an x-ray of her fractured radius. She is going to have her plaster cast replaced with a fibre glass cast. Dr Ranj cuts off the plaster cast. Petal thinks her arm is thin and smelly but this is because she hasn't been able to wash it. Dr Ranj says Petal can choose the colour of her new cast. Petal picks her favourite colour, purple. Dr Ranj puts the new cast on Petal. She loves it and sings a song with Dr Ranj about taking care of your bones and wearing a cast. Petal then gets a special sticker for having being so good during her visit(n)
